DOC.brief_summary: The central hypothesis acupuncture break vicious circle androgen excess reverse insulin resistance improve health relate quality life affective symptom overweight obese woman without Polycystic Ovary Syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Treat Insulin Resistance Women With Without Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) common endocrine metabolic disorder woman . The main metabolic phenotype hyperinsulinemia insulin resistance , independent body weight worsen hyperandrogenism ovulatory dysfunction . Pharmacological treatment symptom orient usually effective metabolic gastrointestinal side effect . Therefore , important evaluate new nonpharmacological treatment strategy , woman PCOS require long-term treatment . Hypothesis Aims Our central hypothesis acupuncture break vicious circle androgen excess reverse insulin resistance improve health relate quality life affective symptom overweight obese woman without PCOS . The specific aim design test hypotheses 1 . Acupuncture ( acute chronic i.e . 5 week treatment , 3 time per week ) improve insulin sensitivity overweight obese woman without PCOS 2 . Acupuncture ( acute chronic i.e . 5 week treatment , 3 time per week ) regulate key signal molecule mitochondrial oxidation/biogenesis skeletal muscle adipose tissue overweight obese woman without PCOS 3 . Acupuncture ( chronic i.e . 5 week treatment , 3 time per week ) improve health relate quality life symptom anxiety depression overweight obese woman without PCOS Time frame study 5-6 week . No long term follow .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 25 < 35 Clinical sign hyperandrogenism ( hirsutism acne ) At least one follow two sign ; oligo/amenorrhea and/or ultrasoundverified polycystic ovary Controls BMI > 25 < 35 , regular cycle 28 day ± 2 day , sign hyperandrogenism . Exclusion criterion woman 1 . Age > 38 year 2 . Exclusion endocrine disorder hyperprolactinemia ( sprolactin < 27µg/L ) , nonclassic congenital adrenal hyperplasia ( 17hydroxyprogesterone < 3nmol/L ) , androgen secreting tumor . 3 . Autoimmune disorder , cancer , Type I diabetes Type 2 diabetes . 4 . Pharmacological treatment ( cortisone , antidepressant , antidiabetic , hormonal contraceptive , hormonal ovulation induction drug judge discretion investigator ) within 12 wks account participant . 5 . Blood pressure > 160 / 100 mmHg 6 . Pregnancy breastfeed last 6 month 7 . Acupuncture last 2 month 8 . Language barrier disabled person reduce ability understand information .
